stimulusHtml: If France has a comparative advantage in the production of grapes, and Italy has an absolute advantage in the production of olives, which of the following statements must be true?
choicesHtml: France and Italy will not benefit from trading with each other.
France can produce more olives than Italy can.
France can produce more grapes than Italy can.
France has a lower opportunity cost in producing grapes than Italy does.
France has a higher opportunity cost in producing grapes than Italy does.
